name: thumbfound
tag_list: mobile, texting, social, golf, sms, mobile-web
overview:
thumbfound enables golf clubs and resorts to easily and inexpensively interact with their members using text messages.

thumbfound provides text enabled shortcodes, an easy-to-use web based management tool, mobile web solutions and flexible API’s for golf clubs and resorts to create and manage two-way communications with their members.

Leveraging the most intimate marketing channel to date, thumbfound’s web-based tool allows for simple integration into existing channels that clubs and courses already use to communicate with their members such as Facebook, Twitter, email, CRM platforms as well as POS systems. Whether it’s tee-time reminders, mobile coupons or promotions, thumbfound has simplified the way golf clubs use text messaging to reach new and existing members with timely targeted information in as little as a few clicks.
